TextLibrary.Text: Khrona
I hear you had some words with the Orc Lords of the neighboring clans.
I hear you had some words with the Orc Lords of the neighboring clans.
I hear you had some words with the Orc Lords of the neighboring clans.
I hear you had some words with the Orc Lords of the neighboring clans.
I did. I don't think they'll give you any trouble for a while.
I did. I don't think they'll give you any trouble for a while.
I did. I don't think they'll give you any trouble for a while.
I did. I don't think they'll give you any trouble for a while.
That's because you don't know them. They'll be beating their chests again in a week or two. Now, what can I do for you?
That's because you don't know them. They'll be beating their chests again in a week or two. Now, what can I do for you?
That's because you don't know them. They'll be beating their chests again in a week or two. Now, what can I do for you?
That's because you don't know them. They'll be beating their chests again in a week or two. Now, what can I do for you?
I need to find out why the Orcs are taking prisoners. Who should I talk to?
I need to find out why the Orcs are taking prisoners. Who should I talk to?
I need to find out why the Orcs are taking prisoners. Who should I talk to?
I need to find out why the Orcs are taking prisoners. Who should I talk to?
You would do best to talk to Gruulkar, the Great Orc himself. Travel south to the Orchold of Gruuldok - you will find him there. Don't expect him to be too helpful though.
